<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Reaper's Lantern](/Spells.aspx?ID=710)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a ghostly lantern that guides the living toward death and the undead toward true death. It sheds bright light in the spell's area, and dim light to twice that area. Though the lantern is insubstantial, you must keep a hand free to hold it or the spell ends (though using the hand for somatic spell components doesn't end the spell). Living creatures and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) in the area when you Cast the Spell, or that enter the area later, must attempt Fortitude saves. Living creatures that fail their Fortitude saves gain only half the normal benefit from [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effects while within the area. Undead targets that fail their Fortitude saves become [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while within the area. Once a creature attempts a save against _reaper's lantern_, it uses the same outcome if it leaves the area and enters it again.

 Once per turn, starting on the turn after you cast _reaper's lantern_, you can use a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet. When you do so, you force creatures in the area that haven't yet attempted a save against _reaper's lantern_ to attempt one.
name: Reaper's Lantern
